gameset

Class Rules

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameset.Rules

  • public class Rules
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the 'background' logic of the liars dice game

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rules()
      Constructor, empty.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean bullShit(Player pl, Player pl2)
      This method is used to callout the player who cast the last bid.
      void compTurn(Player cpu)
      Handles computers turn.
      void newBid(int newValue, int numDice)
      This method is used to update the active bid by the players.
      void newRound()
      This method is invoked at the start of each round to change the hands of all players.
      void resetBid()
      This method is used to reset the active values and number of dice in the current bid.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rules

        public Rules()
        Constructor, empty.

    • Method Detail

      • newRound

        public void newRound()
        This method is invoked at the start of each round to change the hands of all players.

      • resetBid

        public void resetBid()
        This method is used to reset the active values and number of dice in the current bid. this is used before the start of a new round.

      • newBid

        public void newBid(int newValue,
                   int numDice)
        This method is used to update the active bid by the players. Insures their bids are legal.
        Parameters:
        newValue - new value for bid
        numDice - number of dice

      • bullShit

        public boolean bullShit(Player pl,
                        Player pl2)
        This method is used to callout the player who cast the last bid.
        Parameters:
        pl - The last player
        pl2 - The other player
        Returns:
        true or false boolean value

      • compTurn

        public void compTurn(Player cpu)
        Handles computers turn.
        Parameters:
        cpu - player class holding computer
